      • findAllUsers

        @GetMapping(produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<BamUser>> findAllUsers()
        Retrieves a List of all BamUsers from a database.
        Returns:
        A List of BamUsers from a database, and a corresponding Http Status Code in a ResponseEntity

      • findUserById

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BamUser> findUserById(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                           int id)
        Retrieves a specific BamUser from a database by their id.
        Parameters:
        id - An id that uniquely identifies a BamUser in the database
        Returns:
        A BamUser matching the pathVariable id, and a corresponding Http Status Code in a ResponseEntity

      • addUser

        @PostMapping(produces="application/json",
             consumes="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BamUser> addUser(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                      BamUser newUser)
        Takes a BamUser object from a request body, and persist it to a database.
        Parameters:
        newUser - The new BamUser to be added to the database
        Returns:
        The BamUser that was added to the database with its generated id, and a corresponding Http Status Code in a ResponseEntity

      • loginUser

        @PostMapping(value="/login",
             produces="application/json",
             consumes="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BamUser> loginUser(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                      BamUser user)
        Uses the email property of a BamUser object from the request body to retrieve a full BamUser object from a database.
        Parameters:
        user - A BamUser object containing at minimum an email field
        Returns:
        A BamUser from the database that corresponds to the unique email found in the request body, and a corresponding Http Status Code in a ResponseEntity

      • updateUser

        @PutMapping(produces="application/json",
            consumes="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BamUser> updateUser(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                       BamUser updatedUser)
        Takes a BamUser object from a request body, and updates it in a database.
        Parameters:
        updatedUser - An updated BamUser that is to be updated in the database
        Returns:
        The updated BamUser object as it exist in the database, and a corresponding Http Status Code in a ResponseEntity
